definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to fall/to tumble/to trip/(of prices etc) to drop/Taiwan pr. [die2]
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Obama's foreign policy is no less strange.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬的外交政策也令人大跌眼鏡。

sentences.english: What most of us care about is being surprised.
sentences.chinese: 我們大多數人在意的是大跌眼鏡。
